name: push-node
description: push ssl certificate to push-node by socket.io

scripts.pkg: npm install && npm run build && pkg -t node18-win-arm64,node18-win-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64,node18-alpine-arm64,node18-alpine-x64,node18-linux-arm64,node18-linux-x64  --no-bytecode --public-packages '*' --public --out-path dist ./build/push-node.js

author: service@ohttps.com
